level.heading: Selection of managers; management rights of managers.
level.text: Except as otherwise provided in this chapter or the governing principles:
Only the members shall select a manager or managers;
A manager may be a member or a nonmember;
If a manager is not selected, all members shall be managers;
Each manager has equal rights in the management and conduct of the association's activities;
All matters relating to the activities shall be decided by its managers, except for matters reserved for approval by members in ยง 29-1112; and
A difference among managers shall be decided by a majority of the managers.
